name: bashtorio-monorepo
description: Unix Pipe Factory Game - Factorio meets Bash

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter bashtorio-core dev & pnpm --filter web dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter bashtorio-core build && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.build:all: pnpm setup && pnpm build:v86 && pnpm build:rootfs && pnpm build:state && pnpm build
